pullrequest.title: Load GUI Plugins with gzclient parameter -g, fixes issue 1311

content.raw:
Thanks for tackling this!

There is a warning and a couple of failed tests, not sure if the failures are related to this though:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/852/

I'm thinking of a way to test this. We could test calling `addAndLoadPlugin`, not sure how much work that would be...
content.html:
Thanks for tackling this!

There is a warning and a couple of failed tests, not sure if the failures are related to this though:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/852/
